issue.title: [GLib] Glib sources missing from result of 02-source.sh
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-934](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-934). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-934?focusedCommentId=15993077) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
It looks like maybe there was a failure that passed silently in the script when `[~julienledem]` ran it because `set -e` is not in the script

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-934?focusedCommentId=15993320) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
`[~wesmckinn]` Unfortunately I don't have the output anymore.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-934?focusedCommentId=15993718) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This was triaged. Created ARROW-937 about documenting system requirements for creating source releases
